comments.content: Sorry, it was just tiny. Posted larger version.

So far, just substitutes.  
Pixelar [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/graviton/pixelar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317163118/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/graviton/pixelar/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/graviton/pixelar/")

Don

It appears to be Proggy Square:
